item.title: Using iMac bluetooth keyboard and mouse in Ubuntu (20.04 LTS)
item.description: How to use an iMac’s bluetooth keyboard and mouse after wiping out MacOS and setting up Ubuntu.

item.title: Installing Ubuntu 20.04 LTS on iMac with safe graphics
item.description: Problem: On iMac 2009, Ubuntu 20.04 can boot from USB in safe graphics mode, but after installation it only shows black screen
